sermons.title: The Approaching Wave of Persecution
sermons.description: Brother Denny Kenaston shares his burden on the coming persecution that will come in the end times but very possibly soon to Christianity world-wide. He clearly shows biblically that if we are of the kingdom of Christ the kingdom of this world will be in opposition against us. We need to prepare for this and prepare to love our enemies and share the Gospel.

sermons.title: The Tent of Shem
sermons.description: God has appointed a tent as being symbolic of the ultimate union He calls us to.  It is only our own unbelief and prejudice that resists and does not ‘bow’ to this glorious condition of relationship.
